EmailTemplate.subject: Want to help us pick our NCS staff for 2015?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Remember Your Mentor? Want to pick the NCS staff for 2015? Fancy being a Staffing Assessor?
Get Training and Recruitment experience from our dedicated staffing team.
Sign up to either of the two training dates and then pick assessment dates that suit you. Opportunities for after college, weekends and holidays.
Deadline to apply is midnight on Tuesday 27th January.
Click here http://goo.gl/forms/QXDkCvQUFJ to apply.
